title: Name Change
body: I want to change my name, but the name I want is taken by someone who seems to be inactive. Is there anyway to get the name I want?

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, their name will become available after they've been marked inactive and their name protection runs out. For a level 30 account, it has 30 months of protection the moment it goes inactive before the name will go up for grabs. Check out our [Summoner Name Cleanup FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-) for complete details on how this works.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

You can purchase [inactive ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-)Summoner names through the store in the client.  It can take a while for some names to become inactive depending on the level of the account.
